name: Anthony J. HAUBRICK, Administrator of the Estate of Stella Haubrick, Deceased, and Anthony J. Haubrick, in his own Right, Appellant, v. Dr. Frank P. BASKIN

judges: Before O'BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: Anthony J. HAUBRICK, Administrator of the Estate of Stella Haubrick, Deceased, and Anthony J. Haubrick, in his own Right, Appellant, v. Dr. Frank P. BASKIN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Herbert Somerson, Jerome H. Ellis, Norman R. Segal, Philadelphia, for appellant.
James J. McCabe, Jr., Charles Y. Stoelker, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 98
Anthony J. HAUBRICK, Administrator of the Estate of Stella Haubrick, Deceased, and Anthony J. Haubrick, in his own Right, Appellant, v. Dr. Frank P. BASKIN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 15, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Herbert Somerson, Jerome H. Ellis, Norman R. Segal, Philadelphia, for appellant.
James J. McCabe, Jr., Charles Y. Stoelker, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O'BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
